title: Melee Attack & Magic Spells Sound FX Pack
description: Lunge into the heart of the battle with this must-have sound library and unleash a powerful arsenal of original sound effects for your melee weapons and magic spells.
longDescription:
Lunge into the heart of the battle with this must-have sound library and unleash a powerful arsenal of original sound effects for your melee weapons and magic spells. Easily add the sizzle and crackle of combat to your project with a wide range of options. From the clang of swords to the whoosh of arrows, you'll find the perfect sound for every attack. Go deep into organized categories and variations, tailoring the audio to your unique game world. Whether you're crafting brutal axe strikes, bone-crunching hammer blows, or mystical spell explosions, this pack has it all, further enhancing intensity with blood-curdling hit sounds and chilling magical effects. 


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

1 x Loopable Music Track

283 Sound Effects


Melee Attack & Magic Spells Sound Effects and Music Pack is mostly used in RPG, Medieval Combat, Medieval Fantasy, Survival, Fighting, Rogue-like, Action RPG, Fantasy RPG, Warfare and Melee Combat games.


With multiple variations and designed categories, you'll have everything you need to make your weapons sound unique and realistic. Drag-and-drop ready, these sounds are easily searchable and organized for your convenience. Add depth and immersion to your game with our comprehensive sound pack.


This sound effects and music pack includes; 

Music tracks, stingers, sword, axe, hammer, bow, knife, stick, spear, chain, whip, punch, kick, dash, magic spells, electric, wind, fire, water, ice, ground, poison, plant, hit, stab, throw, swoosh
